dependencies.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependencies.name: blast-plus

dependencies.description:
Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning
sequencing reads to long reference sequences
dependencies.name: bowtie2

dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.
dependencies.name: muscle

dependencies.description:
The BIOM file format (canonically pronounced biome) is designed to be a
general-use format for representing biological sample by observation
contingency tables.
dependencies.name: py-biom-format

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
CMSeq is a set of commands to provide an interface to .bam files for
coverage and sequence consensus.
dependencies.name: py-cmseq

dependencies.description:
DendroPy is a Python library for phylogenetic computing. It provides
classes and functions for the simulation, processing, and manipulation
of phylogenetic trees and character matrices, and supports the reading
and writing of phylogenetic data in a range of formats, such as NEXUS,
NEWICK, NeXML, Phylip, FASTA, etc.
dependencies.name: py-dendropy

dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
dependencies.name: py-h5py

dependencies.description:
Hclust2 is a handy tool for plotting heat-maps with several useful
options to produce high quality figures that can be used in publication.
dependencies.name: py-hclust2

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description:
PhyloPhlAn 3.0 is an integrated pipeline for large-scale phylogenetic
profiling of genomes and metagenomes.
dependencies.name: py-phylophlan

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
RAxML (Randomized Axelerated Maximum Likelihood) is a program for
sequential and parallel Maximum Likelihood based inference of large
phylogenetic trees.
dependencies.name: raxml

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

description:
MetaPhlAn is a computational tool for profiling the composition of
microbial communities (Bacteria, Archaea and Eukaryotes) from
metagenomic shotgun sequencing data (i.e. not 16S) with species-level.
name: py-metaphlan

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
